DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether ancrod is effective and safe in the treatment of sudden sensorineural hearing loss (SSHL).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Ancrod in Patients With Sudden Hearing Loss
